original_text: And he said unto them, Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God: but unto them that are without, all these things are done in parables:
korean_text: 이르시되 하나님 나라의 비밀을 너희에게는 주었으나 외인에게는 모든 것을 비유로 하나니

sentences.original_text: Unto you it is given to know
the mystery of the kingdom of God
but unto them that are without
all these things are done in parables
